headline: Senate fight awaits Trump's Supreme Court pick
subHeadline: Red state Democrats face intense pressure from both parties on Supreme Court nominee vote; reaction and analysis on 'The Five.'

utterances.speaker: JESSE WATTERS, CO-HOST
utterances.sentences: Hello, everybody. I'm Jesse Watters along with Kimberly Guilfoyle, Juan Williams, Dana Perino, and Sean Hannity. It's 5 o'clock in New York City, and this is "The Five." Fox News alert, it's decision day for President Trump. In just four hours from now, he'll announce his Supreme Court nominee. It's a bold move that could reshape the high court and country for a generation and cement his presidential legacy. A source is telling Fox News that President Trump has made a final decision after a report that he was considering four candidates, judge's Brett Kavanaugh, Amy Coney Barrett, Raymond Kethledge, and Thomas Hardiman. utterances.sentences: All right. You know what? We're out of time, because we're going to have a big party for our friend, Jesse. Up next, a big surprise in store for Jesse's birthday. So you know what?

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: How big is it?

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Huge.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Huge, that's it. Don't go anywhere, America. "The Five" is back with a party.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: I've been looking forward to this all weekend.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Time to pop your collar, America. It's Jesse's 40th birthday. We're celebrating with his favorite lemon cake and banana pudding here on the set, and we have some surprises here for you, Jesse.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Uh-oh.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: I've been waiting for this all weekend. So let's get started. First up, in honor of you turning the big 4-0, let's take a look --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Oh, no.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: That's right.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: -- at some of your most humble memorable moments on "The Five."

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Uh-oh.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Watch.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Hello, everybody. I'm Jesse Watters.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Jesse Watters.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Jesse Watters.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: Jesse Watters.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Jesse Watters.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: And this is "The Five."

utterances.speaker: GRAPHIC
utterances.sentences: Happy birthday, Jesse!

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Jesse is a poet of Trump-landia.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I'm just happy you're actually listening to me, Juan. Trust me, I know what I'm talking about here. I've always been bullied, you know, because of my looks and my charm and my quick wit. No he doesn't. NO.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Well, that's what I think. That's the way it hits me.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: You're wrong. I don't read Reason. I read The Weekly Standard, because that's what you gave me a subjection for. That is from The New York Times.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Is that not fake news?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: That's when it's not fake news. When it's not good, that's when it's fake news. That's how that works. This is going to be very cutthroat. I'm probably going to sabotage her.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Jesse, are you working?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I'm working. I'm taking pictures here. I made a fashion statement last night on "The Five." Everybody on the Internet said I looked like Ron Burgundy.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: You did.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Stay classy.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: That was purposeful.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Oh, and a moustache.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: You look like the guy from "Revenge of the Nerds."

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Goofy, you look goofy.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Nerdy, you look nerdy.

utterances.speaker: GRAPHIC
utterances.sentences: Just Handsome

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: People always say I look like David Schwimmer, a.k.a. Ross from "Friends."

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: David Schwimmer.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: I don't see any resemblance.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Not at all?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: Not at all. That's actually David Schwimmer, who looks a lot like me. It's David Schwimmer's birthday. All right? That's not me. That's David Schwimmer. I didn't eat all day because I knew the "Food Court" was coming.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: National Doughnut Day. Jesse is very happy. Jesse only has a single quarter pounder.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.sentences: What's in the box?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Oh, you didn't do it! Yes, I love you! I love you! Oh, my gosh, this is the Michael Jackson jacket with the zippers. Smooth criminal. We're debuting a new feature on the show, "Mom Texts." You know, my mom is a liberal Democrat and sometimes texts me during the show. "I cannot and will not identify myself as the mother of Trump's wingman!" "I am honestly concerned that your colleagues have begun to roll their eyes at your diatribes." "What are you talking about?"

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Hey, Mom.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: There she is.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Hysterical. I love it.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: If you can just bear with us for one more thing.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: One more surprise.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: One more surprise and then we're going to talk about it, and we're going to give you some of our advice for turning 40.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: OK.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Are you ready for this?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I'm ready.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: OK. Here we go.

utterances.speaker: STEPHEN WATTERS, JESSE'S DAD
utterances.sentences: Happy birthday, Jesse.

utterances.speaker: ANNE WATTERS, JESSE'S MOM
utterances.sentences: Happy birthday, Jesse.

utterances.speaker: S. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: You've always been active in mind and spirit.

utterances.speaker: A. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: We knew we were in trouble when you stood at seven months, walked at eight months, and ran at nine months.

utterances.speaker: S. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: We've always admired your sense of adventure and imagination.

utterances.speaker: A. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Until you jumped onto a moving lawn mower from the jungle gym in the first grade, claiming to be a superhero.

utterances.speaker: S. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: You were a superior athlete and student.

utterances.speaker: A. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: When you chose to be.

utterances.speaker: S. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: We treasure -- we treasure family summers on the coast of Maine.

utterances.speaker: A. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Until you wouldn't join us in the boat, because you had to tune into listening to Rush Limbaugh.

utterances.speaker: S. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: We taught you to be yourself and to seek the truth.

utterances.speaker: A. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Although we have continued to be baffled by this search.

utterances.speaker: S. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: We are proud of your independence, your courage of conviction, and your soft heart.

utterances.speaker: S. AND A. WATTERS
utterances.sentences: We are the Watters, and we are so happy you are in our world.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Aw, that was so nice. I can't believe you guys did that.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: They didn't even make fun of you. They were sincere.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: They did, in a way. I picked up on it.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: So Jesse, we've got you some great treats.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Yes.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Delights that you wanted from Magnolia Bakery. We got the banana pudding that I introduced you to. And we're big fans of that.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Let's dig right in.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Lemon cake from Del Frisco's.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: We wanted Hannity to be here so that he could give you some advice for -- what do you think for turning 40?

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: I think Jesse should just be Jesse. Although --

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Like Trump.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Exactly.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Let Jesse be Trump.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: No, let Jesse be Jesse.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Thank you.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: And it's his world. Don't forget. Here's the thing. I had no idea both your parents are liberals.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Yes, and not just liberals. Like, hard left.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Oh, and he's going to take this the wrong way. And you turned out normal.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I did.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: So is his son.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I did.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Well, I know your son. By the way, congrats. Raff just got married.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Yes, he did.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Sean, this is about me. OK?

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Hannity, do you want --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Juan, do you have some advice for Jesse.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Hannity is the old guy here that is on a diet, but I'll take the lemon cake.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Yes, don't insult me. Take the cake.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: I'm going to give you a little piece. Here we go.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: OK.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: To keep you light on your feet. It's a big news night.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: That's right. He's got to be ready to go.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Tiny little piece.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Juan, give me the advice for Jesse.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Jesse, you're such a humble guy that I think it would be good, Jesse, if you actually just celebrated your ego.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Celebrate.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Let it out. Let it out, Jesse. Let Jesse be Jesse.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I think you better be careful what you wish for.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Juan, what do you want?

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: But you know what? I honestly think that you are a good guy, and I don't just -- agree with you politically, but God bless. Happy birthday.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Thank you very much, Juan. I appreciate it.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Yes, happy birthday.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Kimberly, do you have any advice for Jesse in his 40s?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: That you can say on the air.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: You're getting very good at listening. Going no, take that back.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: That happens about once a show.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: I help you. Your parents thanked me.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: It's true. It's true.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: By the way, can I double whatever that "eye" thing is, I would absolutely listen. It's a very different world now that we live in. So if you want to survive.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: What Jesse means is --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Like, always throwing ourselves in front of the Jesse truck.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: That's right.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Ask -- ask Dana. this is the greatest story that Dana will never tell. Ask her how she did her job when she was in the White House as press secretary, and there's your answer.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Occasionally, on occasion.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: I'm not telling this.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: It's his favorite thing from -- I want to tell you in the break. I'll tell you in the break, because it's a little bit -- Anyway, happy birthday.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Is that right? Thank you. And thank you for that great video. And thanks, Sean, for being here.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Happy birthday.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Thank you, Kimberly, for cutting the cake and thank you for being such a strong eye. And thank you, Juan, for putting up with all my shenanigans.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: All right. "One More Thing" is up next.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: God bless his parents.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Time now for "One More Thing" -- Kimberly.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: OK. I wanted to do a special "One More Thing" today, because FOX News Channel and FOX Business Network also lost a very beautiful, wonderful human being. You see her right there, Georgina Urena. She was one of our very talented makeup artists here at the network. And she was born and raised here in New York City and has been with us since 2014. She used to do my makeup, as well. She was at the conventions and really super talented. She was a joy to be around. Always walking around with a smile and positive things to say. She was really beloved and a lot of people here were touched by her and very saddened by her very early, you know, loss of her life and such a wonderful human being. But she kept giving even in death, because her organs were donated, and five lives were saved as a result.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Wow.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: So words really can't express how saddened we are about her loss, but her spirit lives on. And she was particularly close to Bismarck here, who we all know, and Wilber. And please, if you can, I posted it on Facebook and Twitter and Instagram, a GoFundMe account created for her family. So if there's anything you can give, it would certainly make a difference.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Yes. She's going to be missed a lot around here.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: That was wonderful, Kimberly.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: God bless her.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Juan.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: It's the wedding season of my life. I've got to tell you, the next generation is getting married. My son got married in June, and this weekend it was my niece's turn. Here are Nick and the beautiful Marisa dancing at the National Museum of Women in the Arts in D.C. That was followed up with a very emotional dance with her dad, Dr. West, who's my brother-in-law. And here's the groom with his mom. His dad passed away and she raised him, so that was a very special moment. Both Marisa and Nick are graduates of Yale Law School. Here's Marisa with her parents. And finally, here's the magic moment as they said their vows. Good luck to the newlyweds.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: That's sweet.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Very sweet.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Great pictures. All right, Dana.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Well, mine is about a chipmunk. This is a chipmunk named Van Gogh. I think we have a little video of it. This is from Ontario, Canada. And he comes every day to get fed as many peanuts as he can possibly stuff in his little cheeks there. You can see that. And as soon as he has as many as he can put in there, he goes and runs to his little borough, and then he eats them all and then he comes back. He can really stuff a lot in his cheeks.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Irresistible.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Very -- yes. And his name is Van Gogh, because he has half an ear.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: OK, good. Thank you, Dana.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Trying to take over. Now Jesse's corny jokes.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I just want to say that, you know, my parents, very quick, that was a very sweet video message, and I love you guys very much. And I have a one thing.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: You were very touched by that.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I was. I was trying to be very manly during that --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: I have one more surprise.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: -- and try not to get emotional. What?

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: I have one more surprise. Do we have a picture here? I had a picture made for you, and it's a picture of you, a portrait, all of Jasper pictures.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Because you know how much I love dogs. I love that! The picture, made by FiveFanPhotoShop, just for you on your birthday.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Very cute. Look at -- he's admiring himself.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Put my picture back up.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAMS
utterances.sentences: Admiring himself.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: I've run out of time for my "One More Thing," was a guy holding onto a subway car. It's totally inappropriate. It's going to take away from the special moment about my birthday. Sean, go ahead.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: That's what we just told you. We don't want you to get in trouble.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: OK.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: I don't really have a "One More Thing," because I --

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.sentences: Nine o'clock tonight!

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Plug your stuff.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Nine tonight, "Hannity" starts at 9. Nine or nine-thirty, the president of the United States -- thank God it is not Hillary -- will announce his Supreme Court justice pick.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Jay Sekulow and Pirro.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Jay Sekulow, Judge Jeanine Pirro will be on. And the left is going to be like Alka-Seltzer in water. All of Juan's friends are going to bubble, fizz, and the battle begins to smear whoever gets chosen. We will have full coverage tonight. We hope you'll watch. And I want to also, "One More Thing," thank all of you for having me. I am the biggest man of this show.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: And you were our biggest supporter when no one believed in the show, that we could make it. And you said --

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Not only did you make it, you beat the competition combined every day and night.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: And the Supreme Court pick is going to be like my birthday present again. Thank you very much.

utterances.speaker: GUILFOYLE
utterances.sentences: Oh, my God.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Set your DVR, never miss an episode of "The Five." "Special Report" up next. What's going on, Bret?

utterances.speaker: BRET BAIER, FOX NEWS ANCHOR
utterances.sentences: Happy birthday, Jesse.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.sentences: Thank you very much.
